spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 8.9 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 767,247 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.4 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,103 Haste for 12 sec.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
